topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5552c44263687249da270200#post_5552c44263687249da270200
Who does?
A large rat once came out of the sewers from the bathroom drain. We drove it away but we decided to take extra precautions.
We put a large rock on the drain so that water could still flow out but the mouse can't.

I sometimes play with it as I took a shower.
